headline: W. R. Berkley Corporation Names Shadi Albert President of Vela Insurance Services
summary: GREENWICH, Conn., July 18, 2025--W. R. Berkley Corporation (NYSE: WRB) today announced the appointment of Shadi Albert as president of Vela Insurance Services. He succeeds Arthur G. Davis, who will assume the role of chairman of the business. The appointments are effective immediately.

Davis, who will assume the role of chairman of the business. The appointments are effective immediately.

headline: Hit The Bottom, Hunt The Yield (Part 3): W. R. Berkley's Baby Bonds
summary: Invest in WRB baby bonds with strong ratings & 7% yields.
